document.full_text: the justice department and the f.b.i. said they had dismantled a giant network of computers infected by malicious software, one that was used in an eight-year financial crime spree.
document.title: u.s. says it shut down password theft network
lines_and_colors: the justice department and the f.b.i. said they had dismantled a giant network of computers infected by malicious software, one that was used in an eight-year financial crime spree.
